rules.name: Add request type for imported access reviews
Approval from email

value.second: I acknowledge the information in this ticket

rules.name: Approve Pending Verification at 7 days

value.jql: NOT status CHANGED AFTER -7d AND status = "Pending Verification" and project = "CIE Service Desk"

value.comment: Hi there, we haven't heard from you in quite some time since the status became "Pending Verification" - We are resolving this ticket for now, if you want to continue on this issue, please comment on this ticket to re-open it, or create a new ticket.

rules.name: Auto-assign critical issues in the DLT queue
rules.description: Assigns Critical tickets in To-Do states to a selected list of users, in a balanced workload fashion

value.jql: "CIE Queue"= "Developer Lifecycle Tooling" AND Assignee = null AND status="Waiting for Service" AND ("Partner Priority" = "ðŸš¨ðŸš¨ Critical")

rules.name: Auto-assign high priority IdM issues to selected users
rules.description:
On the IdM team's request, created a rule with the following requirements:
would auto-assign a high partner priority issue in the IdM Queue(major or Critical) to either (Apuroop Remella or Mani Teja Vankina)

value.jql: statusCategory != Done

rules.name: Auto-assign issues in the AMS queue
rules.description: Assigns tickets in To-Do states(waiting for service) to a selected list of users, in a balanced workload fashion. Users are mentioned by name instead of a defined list as there is no role for AMS, at present.

value.jql: "CIE Pillar"="AMS" AND (Assignee = null AND status in ("Waiting for Service"))

rules.name: Auto-assign issues in the BusinessOps queue
rules.description: Assigns BusinessOps Queue tickets in To-Do states to a selected list of users, in a balanced workload fashion

rules.name: Auto-assign issues in the CCAdmin queue
rules.description: Assigns tickets in To-Do states(Needs triage, waiting for service) to a selected list of users, in a balanced workload fashion[user assignment has been modified from CCAdmin role to specified list, as the team has requested to remove a few users  from being assigned issues]

rules.name: Auto-assign non-critical issues in the DLT queue
rules.description: Assigns tickets in To-Do states to a selected list of users, in a balanced workload fashion

value.jql: Assignee = null AND "CIE Pillar"= "Developer Lifecycle Tooling" AND Status="Waiting for service" AND ("Partner Priority" != "ðŸš¨ðŸš¨ Critical")

rules.name: Auto-assign SovOps queue

value.jql: statusCategory != Done

rules.name: Automated adding of component (Access(Grafana))

components.value: project = "CIE Service Desk" AND "CIE Queue[Dropdown]" = Observability AND text ~ "grafana*" AND status not in (Cancelled, Resolved, Canceled, Closed)

rules.name: Automated adding of component (Access(Kibana)) and adding comment with wiki Link

components.value: project = "CIE Service Desk" AND "CIE Queue[Dropdown]" = Observability AND text ~ "kibana access*" AND status not in (Cancelled, Resolved, Canceled, Closed)

value.comment: Hey there, if you are looking for Prod Kibana Access, please check out this wiki page [https://dev.azure.com/msi-cie/CIE%20Partners/_wiki/wikis/CIE-Partners.wiki/8475/General-Process-for-Production-Log-Access]. If you are looking for non-prod (dev, stage) Kibana Access please ask your project dev manager to add your core id under 'Log Readers Group' in cie-portal. If there is any other issue please reply again.

rules.name: Automated comment on the issues for followup

value.jql: status in ("Waiting for customer" , "Pending Verification") and updated < -5d

value.comment:
Hi Team, 

Please provide an update on this case.

Thanks

rules.name: Automated internal reply reminding the assignee about the time to restoration.

value.comment: Hi there! the SLA threshold - Time to restoration will be breached in next 1 hour. So please try to update the ticket as soon as possible. Many Thanks!

rules.name: Automated internal reply to post ticket update if there is no reply from last 3 days

value.jql: project = "CIE Service Desk" AND status in ("Waiting for Service", "Work In Progress") AND "CIE Queue[Dropdown]" = Observability AND updatedDate <-3d

value.comment: Hi there, there is no update on this ticket since last 3 days. Please update the ticket with current status. Thanks.

rules.name: Automated internal space reply to post ticket update if there is no reply from last 3 days

value.jql: project = "CIE Service Desk" AND "CIE Queue[Dropdown]" = Observability AND status in ("Waiting for Service", "Work In Progress") AND updated <-3d

components.value: project = "CIE Service Desk" AND "CIE Queue[Dropdown]" = Observability

value.comment: Hi there! There is no status update on this ticket since created. The Status is being changed to "Work in Progress".

value.jql: updated < -7d AND project = "CIE Service Desk" AND status in ("Waiting for Customer")

value.comment: Hi there, we haven't heard from you in quite some time. We are declining this ticket for now, if you want to continue on this issue, please comment on this ticket to re-open it, or create a new ticket.

rules.name: Email reporter of cloned issue from CIE Service Desk

value.body:
{{comment.body}} 

NOTE: If you have added attachments to the original ticket on the CIE Service Desk, you will need to re-add those as they have not copied over to Cyber Service Desk

Hey [~accountId:{{assignee.accountId}}],

This ticket will breach its SLA in 30 minutes. You should action or reassign it as soon as possible.

Cheers,
Your friendly automation bot

P1S: Resolve issues due to inactivity
rules.description: P1 Cloud: Resolves issues after 14 days of no updates after requesting verification from customer

value.jql: (status = "Pending Verification" or status = "Monitoring") and updated < -14d

value.comment:
Hi {{issue.reporter.displayName.split(\" \").first}},

We haven't heard back from you for 14 days, so we're automatically closing this support request for now.

Please feel free to re-open or comment on this issue if you still need help!

Cheers,
  Automation for Jira

rules.name: PagerDuty manager
Partner Priority Manager
Prompt customer for comment at 3 days

value.jql: updated < -3d AND project = "CIE Service Desk" AND status in ("Waiting for Customer")

value.comment: Hi there, we haven't heard from you in a while. If you would like to keep this request open or if you have additional information, just reply.

rules.name: Reset the resolution - Need Triage
Resolved issues remain in current status when fields are updated
Resolve issue in scope of user creating result

value.comment: {{webhookData.message}}

rules.name: Resolve issues due to inactivity

value.jql: updated < -90d AND project = "CIE Service Desk" AND statusCategory in ("To Do", "In Progress") AND status not in ("Under Review", "Backlog", "Canceled")

value.comment:
Hi {{reporter.displayName}}

This ticket has not been updated for 90 days. We'll mark it Canceled for now. If necessary, add a comment to re-open it.

When considering whether or not to re-open, please consider if the topic makes more sense as 
- a feature request that could be added to a product roadmap, or
- an issue that would be better addressed by involving third party support

Thanks!

rules.name: Resolve issues due to inactivity-test

value.jql: updated < -1d AND project = "CIE ITSM Service Desk" AND statusCategory in ("To Do", "In Progress")

value.subject: {{issue.key}} being closed
value.body:
ticket - moved to closed due to inactivity.

(JIRA automation test)
